content: {"locationId": "1594", "organizationId": "1450", "name": "Great Mines Health Center", "address1": "1 Southtowne Drive", "address2": "", "city": "Potosi", "state": "MO", "zipCode": "63664", "country": null, "phone": "573-438-9355", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "37.92", "longitude": "-90.78", "foodPrograms": "Community Mobile Market, Food Pantry", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "", "aboutUs": "", "notes": "Great Mines Health Center is a local Federally Qualified Health Center that provides services such as medical, dental, behavioral health, specialty, and now a food pantry. We are proud to serve our community and are excited to offer this new service. During your visit to the food pantry a Community Health Worker will screen for and assist with any other resources that may be needed. The food pantry is open the second and fourth Thursdays of the month and it is by appointment only, after an application and supporting documents have been reviewed and approved.   We also hold a food distribution the first Tuesday of every month. This is a drive through set up and no application, appointment, or qualification is required.      Call us today for more information!", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "573-438-8345", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Curbside Pickup / Drive Through, Grocery / Client Choice, Indoor Service, Lifting / Carrying Assistance, Outdoor Service, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags, Reservations", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 17, "regionName": "St. Louis Area Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "2663eb40-ca6e-413e-8ab2-bf60bbdd2771.jpg", "website": "https://stlfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Tuesday 10:30 AM-12:30 PM", "Thursday 8:00 AM-3:30 PM (BY APPOINTMENT ONLY after approval of application) [ 2nd, 4th week(s)]", "Thursday 8:00 AM-3:30 PM (BY APPOINTMENT ONLY after approval of application) [ 2nd, 4th week(s)]"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
